meanings.definition: The whole quantity or extent of something
meanings.sent1: She ate all the cookies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: All the students in the class raised their hands.
meanings.sent3: The toddler tried to fit all the toys in the tiny box.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like a river that encompassed all.
meanings.sent5: The storm swept all the leaves off the trees.

meanings.definition: Every member or individual of a group or quantity
meanings.sent1: All of the apples in the basket were ripe.
meanings.sent2: The team cheered for all of their teammates.
meanings.sent3: The magician made all of the rabbits disappear at once.
meanings.sent4: Her smile brightened all of the faces in the room.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led them to all of the hidden gems.
